Articles.Content:
Hi! Is there an official twitter account of KSP?

Also, if I want some news about the development of this game, is there any twitter account I should follow?
Each of the (or at least most the) devs have their own, but the official one is @KerbalSpaceP
Maxmaps' twitter is the best for feature announcement, although devnotes and the Squadcast remain the best source of news.

@MaxMaps is the one to follow for early info (though there is a fair bit of non-KSP content too, it's a personal account). @KerbalSpaceP has official announcements (including the dev notes) and some fan creations.
